testcase.name: show new message form - Should return OK status
show new message form with invalid theme id - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
show new message form with null theme id - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
create new message - Should redirect to the /themes/theme/{themeId}/message/{mesId} route
create new message with invalid theme id - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
create new message with null theme id - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
create new message with invalid field - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
show edit message form - Should return OK status
show edit message form with invalid theme id - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
show edit message form with null theme id - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
show edit message form with invalid message id - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
show edit message form with null message id - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
edit message - Should redirect to the /themes/theme/{themeId}/message/{mesId} route
edit message with invalid theme id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
edit message with null theme id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
edit message with invalid message id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
edit message with null message id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
edit message with invalid field - should return BAD_REQUEST status
show delete message form - should return OK status
show delete message form with invalid theme id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
show delete message form with null theme id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
show delete message form with invalid message id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
show delete message form with null message id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
delete message - Should redirect to the /themes/theme/{themeId} route
delete message with invalid theme id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
delete message with null theme id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
delete message with invalid message id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
delete message without check field - should return BAD_REQUEST status
